website_summaries.verdict: This colorful adornment for the shower comes with two heads, one of which is removable for ease of bathing.
pros: Customizable: choose from 24 water flow patterns and 4 spray patterns
Enjoy the 7-LED color rotation for an invigorating spa experience
cons: Rare complaints that lights failed to work after several months of use

customer_reviews.title: Loving my new PowerSpa!
customer_reviews.text: I installed my new PowerSpa this morning and it's absolutely amazing! I turned off the lights and enjoyed showering in the dark with a light show! It does say that if you use both shower heads at the same time, the water pressure will reduce. It did for me, but it wasnt that big of a deal. It was like being in a rainfall of water! Very relaxing. If you follow the instructions exactly and take into consideration the leakage tips, you should have no problems putting this together. Let's see how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Harris

customer_reviews.title: Toss Up
customer_reviews.text: So I have a love/hate relationship with this shower head. It puts out nice water pressure, and the color effects are really cool. My problems with it are that it's very difficult to change the water settings.I feel like the little tab that's used to change it from one setting to the next is going to break on me each time I turn it. Another problem is that the handheld portion always slides forward. You have to set it in the cradle just right, or it turns down towards the floor. I don't think I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Upsetting and disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Everything seemed in order when I received the product in the mail. It was packaged well and seemed in good order. After installation, the main shower head won't light up. Then, after I opened the valve to utilize both shower heads, it proceeded to leak out of the main water diverted (no leaks from any of the female seals). I turned the diverted off, and the main shower head works fine with no leaks, then try again to utilize both, and the diverted continues to spray everywhere. Cheap, junk product. And, for those of you thinking it's gotta be user error; I've been a plumber for 17years.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas McNellis

customer_reviews.title: A fun, lovely set that I recommend for kids or apartment dwellers.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower head! We live in an apartment whose shower head was the run of the mill, piece of cheap. It's also very dim in this bathroom with the only lighting being the vanity light. Not only does this shower head put on a light show, but it has helped so much with water pressure. Having the hand held also helps with the six year old as well as the 10 year old pug. You are able to switch between both shower heads, or use both simultaneously. The lights are powered by water, so no worry about batteries or anything electrical (HOORAY SCIENCE!).
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shower heads and good pressure
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shower heads and good pressure. Light is bright enough to take a dimly lit mood shower with. Light on the main shower head went out after having it for a few months and I got a replacement sent when I contacted them which I appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Lendon Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Original and replacement dual showerhead Were defective. Proceed with caution!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the dual shower head and for some reason the LED on the stationary shower wasn’t working. So I opted to return and replace. The second replacement dual shower head I just received was also not working. This time the stationary lights work but has a bad leak. I don’t know if they’ll send me another but The original and replacement both were defective.
customer_reviews.author: Geaux4it

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install but after only being used for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but after only being used for a little over a week, the lights in the hand held shower head no longer work. Not a big enough deal to me to return it, but if the lights are the only reason you are buying this product be warned...
customer_reviews.author: Kevin02

customer_reviews.title: Rainbow Effect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with the included instructions. The included valve is plastic and feels very delicate. There are 8 LED lights that light up randomly. I am on a well, pressure is reduced to hydro-power the shower head, and little to no pressure if you try to use both shower heads at once. The noise the shower head(s) makes is tolerable but definitely noticeable. Overall not impressed, the light output is not enough to shower without the bathroom lights on and the pressure decrease was not worth the light show for me.
customer_reviews.author: HESS_NC

customer_reviews.title: ... shower head to fall forward way more than I like. The plastic also feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: The holder for the removable shower head is fairly loose and will cause the shower head to fall forward way more than I like. The plastic also feels cheap. That being said, you don't have a plethora of choices when it comes to these. Some of the higher end companies make ones that change color, but only for water temp. If you are looking for a stellar change your showering, shower head, look elsewhere. If you want a color changing one, this one is a bit more fancy then my previous one I bought online and finally burned out.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B

customer_reviews.title: Really nice while it lasts!
customer_reviews.text: Shower pressure was definitely more versatile and enjoyable than my original shower head. Unfortunately, the primary shower head on the unit I purchased started emitting a high-pitched water pressure noise intermittently (corresponding to fluctuations in color) a few months after installation so I'm going to have to try and exchange it. Still, the fact that I want to exchange it suggests (at least to me) that it's enjoyable while it lasts! The colors are really only dazzling if you're showering in very low light, like candlelight, but if you're a fan of quiet meditative showers in the dark, this might be the shower head for you!
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as described
customer_reviews.text: After installing this item, the handheld part won't light up .... only the main shower head. And when you used the dual head function, there is not enough pressure to make the lights work. So the light will only work when I am exclusively using the main shower head, which kind of defeats the whole purpose of this item. It's such a pain to package up and return, otherwise I would return it right away. It's definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Otterness

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and disappointed again
customer_reviews.text: My product arrived used. Finger prints and water marks all over the item. Item wasn’t in the proper boxing. I’m a little funny about items I pay for being used and returned. If I wanted a used item then I would have bought it used. Makes me wonder why it was returned. I do not have high hopes for this item. Update: I finally received the new item and I can’t say I’m impressed. It’s nothing like the picture shown. The lights are not bright at all and all the lights do not light up at the same time. One side lights then the other side does. My kids were disappointed for the second time on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shower head is so cheaply made and very bad design
customer_reviews.text: I took a vide but I couldn’t upload but water dripping problem ended up a lot of money spending who worked on my bathroom as the main shower head is not working. I need a perfect replacement something like “DreamSpa Ultra-Luxury Extra-large 8 Inch Chrome Face 5-Setting Rainfall LED Shower-Head by Top Brand Manufacturer. Color of LED lights changes automatically according to water temperature” or better. I prefer 8 inch one please with LED. As this costed me so much money if I call a labor to replace I need the better replacement shower head so that I can revise the rating. Please help fix my issue.
customer_reviews.author: RAJKUMAR GENTYALA

customer_reviews.title: Pressure for lights
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our boring 2 piece shower head with this one. We wish the water pressure wasn't reduced. Also the color isn't able to be chosen. It's just random. Not as many pressure type options as our old 2 piece shower head. So I guess it was a trade for light and colors for less pressure and setting options. Still not sure if it's worth it. We might switch back to the old one. But still a fun shower head if your really Enjoy color changing lights.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Dalaba

customer_reviews.title: Really a bummer.
customer_reviews.text: Well after having my Plummer friend come out charge me 59 bucks a hour to install it properly, first thing he tells me that what I brought was just cheap junk :( well that kinda sucks but expected by a plumber, but anyway later on after installing it he tells me the plastic is leaking from the shower heads that he has to put 2 extra washers in to stop it from leaking at the fixtures but he can stop the shower heads themselves because it's just cheap plastic he said not really happy about that but I'm still using it as I dont want to go out and waste some more money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking!!!!? Not worth it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I completely regret this purchase!!!! First it leaked water, than I read some more reviews and found out there is a washer you can remove to stop that... So I did that no more leak.... Now there's a high pitch squeal sounds from it and the only way to stop that is to use the wand.... The wand doesn't stay with the spray option.... In short don't waste your money but another one.... Instead of buying this one just to have to buy another one...
customer_reviews.author: Gina L Vantreese

customer_reviews.title: Decent spray handle, not very impressed
customer_reviews.text: "pressure boost" is non-existient, really did nothing to "boost" the water pressure, the main showerhead leaks in front - like the front mechanism is broke, has 3 settings on each head, general spray, slightly different general spray and massage. not too much difference between the two non-massage. Lights are nice, but I'm kinda bummed by the water dribbling out the front if I just use the main showerhead. Followed instructions for "front shower leaking" and that didn't change much. I really want to like it, but I'm not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: TheElderGodFather

customer_reviews.title: Sensory or autism therapy MUST HAVE! 2 shower heads means no one shivering
customer_reviews.text: My autistic son begged for these as a birthday gift. As soon as everyone left the party, he was dragging my husband into the bathroom to install! Then he got his Bluetooth speaker ready, hit the lights, and it’s a shower light show dance party! He loves it, and watching the colors fade in and out as a hypnotic and soothing to your mind sensation. It’s a 2 head shower, great for me grabbing the detachable head to stay warm but husband can be under the fixed head. That way no one is shivering in Syberia! Ha ha
customer_reviews.author: LaNae

customer_reviews.title: 0 customer support did not reply to my message about the ball joint leaking.
customer_reviews.text: Junk 0 customer service main shower head leaked out of the ball joint immediately upon install the shower head on the wand works okay had to put my old shower head back on with it though so that was a big bummer. Messaged the seller got no response kept meaning to send another message so by the time I got on to check on it was outside the return window. I can't recommend the product that didn't work and has zero customer service bummed I wasted my money. Look for a better seller or model
customer_reviews.author: Joshua V.

customer_reviews.title: don't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these 1yr and 4 months ago 1 still works the other the lights went out. I contacted interlink and after several e-mails they ask if I wanted a refund or replacement . when I said replacement they replied the warranty is up they could notdo anything for me. why not just say that in first reply instead of 4 emails over the course of 2 weeks. pretty lame. I have a total of 4 of these but will not buy any more
customer_reviews.author: engineer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light party!
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of my favorite purchases from amazon. It’s like a light show party in the shower. Makes me not want to get out! Super easy to install too. No tools required and took me maybe 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Missed my chance to return..
customer_reviews.text: This item seemed cool, definitely an impulse buy but got it and installed it, pretty quick and easy. The lights came on, pressure was surprisingly weak in all functions but was good enough. The deal breaker was my wife is allergic to some metals, and one shower with this and she was itchy all over for days, nearly missed work. Needless to say we needed to return, but missed the window, even still will not be using again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This dual shower head setup is a wonderful quality product. I definitely recommend it for anyone looking to buy a shower head. It lights up on its own without any batteries for those who are wondering. I would say that when you run both shower heads at once that they do not give out the best water pressure as you would get when running just one. But the water pressure when running both is still good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Garland

customer_reviews.title: Not for longterm use
customer_reviews.text: Shower heads were extremely easy to install and had crystal clear instructions. The first shower I took was super fun and colorful. However the second time I turned it on there was no light at all. I did also notice that the water does not completely drain out which makes me worry about future mold issues. Think ill just put this in the spare bath and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Lil.miss.liss

customer_reviews.title: Super Shower Head
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice shower head. The lights are nice and while I wouldn't suggest showering in the complete dark, they are just as cool with the lights dimmed. I am not sure why, but when I leave the shower wand on pulsate, it works for a few minutes and then goes to a straight spray. Not a major problem or issue as I purchased this for a place I was renting and will be leaving it behind when I leave. Still a great shower head, with multiple settings and the lights are just a bonus feature.
customer_reviews.author: RLD 1427Top Contributor: Welding

customer_reviews.title: Great water pressure, fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install Great water pressure I suggest wrapping plumber’s tape around all of the attachments to avoid any leaking Do not use tools, everything can be done by hand Kids love the lights and I can rinse my toddler’s hair without him screaming at me because it’s like a party now Changing between settings can be a little difficult but I’m assuming the slide switches will loosen a little over time
customer_reviews.author: deLaAmber

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Do not like this product at all. not a single one option, looks, or performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Illuminated Shower Head
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome! Lights up your shower and is also very efficient! The customer service department is awesome and resolves you issues super quick!
customer_reviews.author: Mad Maxx

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay upright and makes a loud shrieking noise as water passes through
customer_reviews.text: Horrible thing. Installation was fairly easy, but the screw that holds the faucet to the cord is plastic and very flimsy. The lights work just fine, and the removable head is very light, but it has a tendency to fall off the stand because the stand itself won't stay upright. The main problems is that the shower head started "screaming" after about a week. A loud screeching shriek was produced from either of the shower heads. It's incredibly loud and annoying. I wouldn't purchase another of these.
customer_reviews.author: Maliha

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. No leaks. Colors operate from both heads. Easier than I thought it would be. Nice and shiny. Instructions could be a little better and use a professional edit by an English speaker. I have low water pressure so hard to gauge that part but I can say even without the flow restrictor the pressure didn't seem any better than my previous one, which was a little disappointing. Otherwise satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Maur DL

customer_reviews.title: Great for a few months...
customer_reviews.text: Update: 2/21/2020: We are buying a different shower head from a different company via Amazon. This one is going in the trash. It lights up occasionally but not very brightly. Now it makes a high pitch screeching noise when it’s running. Easy to install & use. The shower heads lit up brightly with multiple colors for a few months of use. But 3 days ago only the handheld lit up just ONE color, it used to do multiple colors. The stationary shower head no longer lights up any colors. Oddly enough now that the lights stopped working the water pressure has increased.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Good Product But Could Be Improved
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, the provided Teflon tape came in very handy. It could be a water pressure issue in my building, though I doubt that, but the LEDs are not as bright as I thought they would be. There are no windows or secondary light source in my bathroom. With the light off, the LEDs can barely light up the shower tub area enough to see without the main bathroom light on. Also, it would have been nice to have a setting that "sprays" the water in a wide gentle spray. Other than those issues, it's a good solid product.
customer_reviews.author: RobbJ86

customer_reviews.title: Never changed colors. Hard to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: This will be my second shower head. The first never changed colors, only turned red during hot water and green during startup so that was an issue. I've had the first set for about 8 months to a year and it hunks up pretty bad, black and brown crap clogs the holes due to it being unable to drain the water out of the showerhead. The second purchase was even worse. The stationary head didn't light up at all and the water pressure was pure garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: If could give this product zero stars I would. I bought it last summer and finally got around to installing it. I had an actual plumber instal it for me. It leaks, the pressure is minimal, only the main head works. After about 5 minutes in what was the weakest shower I have ever taken, it took another 5 to rinse my hair. Now I have to get a different shower head. This one is garbage. Since I bought it last summer, I cannot return the shower head. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RandiSu Tanem

customer_reviews.title: Lights and water. Almost like a fountain beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Hang these and works great. They change colors automatically and when you turn the top part on it changes colors separately. If you turn on the top part by itself the light on bottom sprayer turns off with the water. So it no water is on that sprayer, no light.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This shower head sucks. The light stopped working two minutes into my first shower with it. It’s fancy but for this I could’ve saved money and just got a regular double fancy shower head. The whole point of this purchase was for the light effect and the lights do not work. I would not recommend this item. I buy a lot from amazon and this was a huge let down.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Pherarri

customer_reviews.title: Cool but not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool... easy installation... only problem is it just stays red 90% of the time. Haven’t seen it go blue. And it barely shows green. Not sure if I got one that doesn’t work or that’s just how it works... pressure is great and shower was the best I’ve had. Cool and relaxing. Just wish it was the light show as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the problems you will have
customer_reviews.text: I got my shower and when I went to put it together the hand held shower head did nothing but leak. It was so bad the water pressure went to about 50 %. I’ve installed many shower heads through my life so I know what I’m doing ! I called the company and they said they would send another part. Nice customer service ! Well today I just use the rotating head to take my shower. As I was showering the shower head made some noise and the l e d lights just quit working. I see now I bought a lemon. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Easyrider

customer_reviews.title: Color what...
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased a similar item. The lighted colors only lasted for a few months, but at least, they corresponded to the water temperature. When the water was hot, the color was red. When the water was cold, the color was blue, and when the water was luke warm, the color was green. When I noticed the new device, I had hoped that the color issue had been addressed. However, with the currently purchased device, the colors do not correspond to the water temperature. There is no relation to the water temperature, unlike the previous device, and I guess I will have to wait to see how long the lights will last before they stop operating. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: WAYNE TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Where’s my colors?
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice shower head but the light show sucks if you like any color than red. The pictures show these shower heads on blue and green and red. There is no blue or green at any temp. And the actual light output is pitiful. Ad specifically says changes every few seconds. It lies.
customer_reviews.author: Tom G.

customer_reviews.title: Works well if you didnt buy it for the light function.
customer_reviews.text: Colors dont work if using both heads at once. Mine just stays red unless I run all water through one. Then it might slowly rotate colors parts at a time. I had a single head previously that would fade from color to color and i loved it. This was disappointing as I was hoping for the same experience x2.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Salinas

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I am completely upset with this product. I bought my first product in Jan. 2020 and the second in Feb. 2020. The first product stopped turning colors within less than two months and by then I had already ordered another one to install in my second bathroom not knowing it was going to stop working within less than a month. I wish I could get my money back for both but its past the date. I have had similar products in the past that have lasted over a year. I tried to go with this one because it had dual shower heads, unfortunately I should have stuck with my original brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores

customer_reviews.title: So far, it's pretty great.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a few weeks now. I'm not that handy around the house and they were easy to install. Nice dim LED light, better for darker rooms, or stalls like mine. Nice water flow and the LEDs work great. I know of the reports that sometimes they stop working after a while so I'll update if they fail. But, so far so great.
customer_reviews.author: J Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work properly after only a month. Update: Company took care of it for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have had it a month & used it less than a month & the lights don't work properly. Also, there is something floating in the handheld head that blocks 1 of 3 of the sets of holes in the center for the massage setting, not allowing the water to flow out. Return / exchange window closed Feb 2. I have contacted the seller, waiting on their reply. Currently do not recommend this. Update: I believe it is defective from the factory. I have heard from the company and they have issued a refund. Very eased with their timely response & taking care of the customer! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: Does as expected and fun
customer_reviews.text: My son and I loved having this in our shower but my husband was not super fond of it. We all had different preferred settings so I think he was just tired of changing it from the previous shower person. I love the versatility of having sprayer with multiple spray options as well as having both run at the same time if you like. It lights up as expected and while our bathroom is rather bright, you could still see it. We have hard water so the brightness will definitely be affected by any water build up as well but cleaning it just light other shower heads works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun shower head!
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, but unfortunately falls short of a good reliable product. I installed the shower heads and ran fine during test run. Later in the day I ran the shower and the bottom head began to screech loudly and no matter what I did, I could not get it to stop. The extend shower head however worked fine all along. Called company and they were super friendly and addressed the malfunctioning head by replacing it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Ubu Simms

customer_reviews.title: Defective. inadequate pressure. led lights too dim to shower in
customer_reviews.text: Was a total let down.. I have insane well pressure to my house after installing this head it leaks from the 3 way diversion box and the led lights barely even illuminate and if so its always red. definitely not working
customer_reviews.author: Jake B.

customer_reviews.title: you'll be fine. My main disappointment is that the LED lights ...
customer_reviews.text: The product's instructions were sometimes lacking, but if you're not a dimwit, you'll be fine. My main disappointment is that the LED lights in the hand unit quit working after the 2nd shower, and we bought this so our child would be less afraid of the shower. I'd send it back, but at such a low price, it will not be worth it as you probably have to pay return shipping and hope you get the refund/replacement without any other fees. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Lugnutts

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I just got them yesterday so I really have no clue on how long they will last so with that said I love them! The water pressure is great while I run both heads! The colors are amazing! I have some trouble changing the setting on the fixed head because it is able to move so you can direct the water as you please and when I attempt to change the setting it moves instead. I am short my husband has no trouble I am sure it’s my height! I love taking. Shower I never knew a shower could be so much fun! So glad I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Robinson

customer_reviews.title: The color effects are great, but the 2
customer_reviews.text: The color effects are great, but the 2.5 water flow seems less than my old combo shower head that only had 2.3. The handheld seems to spread the water streams out too much for my liking. Also, I can't get the locking mechanism to actually lock the entire unit in place. Now whenever I reposition one of the shower heads, it moves the entire unit around the pipe unless I hold onto it while repositioning. Overall I like it, but it isn't as good as my old unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kawika

customer_reviews.title: Soothing.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like showering in the soft light. Other showerlights turn my shower into a disco and are loud but not this one! This light gently shifts between colors and is NOT based on the temperature of the water which is great because my water heater puts out an even temperature so those other showerlights are not needed.
customer_reviews.author: John Blake

customer_reviews.title: Designed to last just past its warranty
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed this for just over a year. Then the bearings that power the LED's started to squeal like crazy. 1st the hand held. Two weeks later, the main head. Both squealing loudly. Yet another product designed to last just past its warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Young

customer_reviews.title: Water colors
customer_reviews.text: What I like, it was easssssy to install no leakage on first assembly. The reason I say first assembly is I've changed my shower head several times and had to rerassemble it at least twice to sip leakage. It looks great, works well. Thank you. Second time purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: benz500sel

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A FUN GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Easiest install ever -ALL necessary items included, even plumbers' tape was included, which was great touch! I'm a pretty "tool/repair" savvy female but this could've been installed by a true novice...the lights are great-the different settings for shower stream & ability to use 1 or both shower heads separately or simultaneously is fabulous!!! Installed this for our daughter's shower for first night before entering middle school, so it not only delighted me but she LOVES it...installed in shower/bath combo so the options for use are perfect for shower or bath-for kids and adults HIGHLY recommend...lights are fun & pretty...the changing of lights is such s treat!
customer_reviews.author: Lee W.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: My husband was able to install it very easily, however, it didn't work the way it was supposed to. The bottom head, water just poured from it while the top main head made noise and doesn't light up at all. I finally had my husband to take the second head off. The main head works better but still doesn't light up nor change colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The only complaints i have is that when using both shower heads simultaneously, the detachable one doesn't have the greatest pressure. The other thing is that the whole head can easily become loose but that shouldn't really be a problem unless you pull on it too hard or something.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Racquel Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The cool thing, is no batteries are used
customer_reviews.text: The cool thing, is no batteries are used. Everything is self contained. Water-flow powers the electronics. This is a give & take between a high function head vs internally lighted shower head for looks. This isn't anything like a nine setting head but this is for fun AND function. So I rate this 4★ because each head has just 3 settings and pressure is shared when using both heads so pressure drop is there.
customer_reviews.author: Winston Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Color is not consistent but I enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, good water pressure, led light adds a cool feature. Doesnt bother me but I will say that he led color is not consistent based on temperature. Mine seems to be more of s light show cycling between all the colors but normally red. Again doesn’t bother me but if you think your going to get a solid color you might be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Led lights failed after only 2 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to give this a good review but after only two weeks the bottom shower head led lights broke.
customer_reviews.author: MysteryMan

customer_reviews.title: I love the color changes
customer_reviews.text: Being a little kid at heart, I love the color changes! As far as a shower, this is as good as any I have had in the past 15 years. Since showers are made to reduce waterflow to be conservative in water consumption, none of them have the pressure that we used to enjoy in years gone by. It's a necessity that I applaud, but at the same time lament.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia Fredricksen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this shower head. I bought it for my kids originally but after a long day, sitting with the lights off and the hot shower doing a light show for you, well thats pretty cool. Super easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Wilkison

customer_reviews.title: packaging-The misfit parts.
customer_reviews.text: different parts in a bag? I thought that was weird but I had my old shower head thrown out and had this man to install the new one. He could not get the hand held shower head to stay in an upright position so the water will go on me. Instead the shower head goes to the side-3 o'clock position or 9 o'clock position. He could not get it to stay in place. There is no leaking, it is installed properly. The misfit parts!
customer_reviews.author: carmella

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: I like the shower head but compared to our other shower head it makes the water pressure low on the hand held when both are in use other than that though it's great. The hand held isn't heavy it's easy to switch between the two or to use both. It's been about a month or so now haven't had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya sanders

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: This product is no good. I ordered this item and when it came and was installed it was leaking. I sent it back and received a replacement, when that arrived and installed the lights weren't working so I returned it again. This time I had to re order because Amazon only gives you 1 replacement,upon arrival and installed again I encountered problems - this time the lights werent workibg and there was leaking. I'm just completely over this item and I returned and received my refund. This product in my opinion is just cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Romero

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Installed in about 5 mins. Very happy with our purchase, works great and no leaks. Recommend using the white plumber tape stuff it comes with and wrap around every ends with "groves" that you will be screwing parts on to ensure no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: This is just soo cool! The only minor issue I have is that ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just soo cool! The only minor issue I have is that when both shower heads are on at the same time, the pressure isn't high enough to cause the colors to change... they are kind of stuck on Red. But when I switch to either shower head by itself, the pressure is high enough for nice color change. So it's just our house pressure is low... not the shower head fault. ;) Overall, highly recommended product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good lighted Shower to make bath time fun!
customer_reviews.text: This shower head works well and is fun for the shower. The light isn't terribly bright, but it is enough in a dark room, and comes in handy during power outages. Water pressure is probably the weakest area here: it is not great, but that is the nature of something like this that is drawing off some of the water pressure to power the light. Initially, the unit made a squealing sound, but that has gone away over time. This light is good, and a worth purchase if you are looking for something like this for your shower.
customer_reviews.author: MrSteveee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, lots of settings
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Hooks right onto a normal shower and is very easy to install! I love the different settings and the hose part I use to wash my dogs with. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Genna

customer_reviews.title: Magical!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works so well and makes the shower magical! Sorry I didn't take any pics but just take my word for it you won't regret getting this. Its just like any regular shower head assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: This think leaks all over. The hose for the handheld leaks like crazy. Had it installed so I dont want to pay for anther installation fee. It only worked ok for 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: J. Orrico

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a nice shower head for our daughter. Too bad only 1 of the heads lights up. No matter which position the diverted knob is in, only one head lights up. Total bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Best shower 🚿 I have ever taken!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't give off light. But then again it wasn't supposed to. But the entertainment value is great and relaxing. Just be careful not to stay too long in the shower and run out of hot water! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: Low Power / water pressure + low quality
customer_reviews.text: This shower head was found to drastically reduce the water pressure compared to what we used to have, we switched back to our previous head. In addition, the plastics make a lot of noise.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Showerhead has rubber uneven holes where water dispenses unevenly and outside of shower stall
customer_reviews.text: While I do love it. I give it a 3 star due to many rubber holes in the handheld showerhead are cut or pushed in ,making the water stream not flow straight. While the water should all flow evenly straight out of the holes, I have about 10 holes out of wack and spit water in all directions, then flowing outside of shower stall and causing a big mess.
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The fitting where it attaches to water source was faulty, leaked enough that is was useless asked for replacement Or refund no answer from seller. Avoid this product
customer_reviews.author: chris cunningham

customer_reviews.title: It was fun, colorful
customer_reviews.text: The product was fabulous the first 2 months I had it! It was fun, colorful, and everything I expected. Even the water pressure and settings were great. Unfortunately, the hand held piece fell and as it hit the tile wall, broke. I am past deadline to return, and while I don't blame the seller, the manufacturing of this product is much cheaper than I would have hoped. Really Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Will remove this as soon as I buy a better product.
customer_reviews.text: leaks around all the pipes, difficult to turn to the two diff shower heads, not user friendly for kids - which is of course why you want the lights anyway- grandma has flooded her bathroom more than once to keep the water in the tub due to the leaking and difficulty turning the lever. Will remove this as soon as I buy a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lassiter

customer_reviews.title: Worst shower head ever.
customer_reviews.text: Worst shower head ever. When I assembled the product the fixed head would be great if you want a waterfall shower head. More water leaks out of under the plastic front than the actual jets. Sometimes the LEDs come on other times dark. The hand held works ok. Need to redesign the fixed head.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T.

customer_reviews.title: U won’t be disappointed !!
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is awesome I love it with all of the different colors
customer_reviews.author: caramel 44

customer_reviews.title: LuminesX shower head
customer_reviews.text: It works great with water pressure. But I don’t see 7 colors. Only 3. I like the fact that the main head is stationary and the second head you can remove to spray the walls etc It does lose a bit of pressure if you use both at once. Overall. If I saw 7 colors. I’d give it a 5. But no biggie
customer_reviews.author: Michele J

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product! Fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of my favorite purchases! Works great. Wasn’t to difficult to install, love the colors. Low pressure does not work as well with lights FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Leaks everywhere and when not on water pooling in shower head. Ordered a replacement so we shall see if that works better...
customer_reviews.author: Dmn6355

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, easy to install. Main shower head doesn't light up, will be returning to Amazon. Cheap feeling plastic but it's what I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tim mack

customer_reviews.title: liked it so much bought a 2nd one - but that one had a leak
customer_reviews.text: We liked this shower head so much after we put it into the kids bathroom we ordered a 2nd one for our shower. Unfortubately the second one had a leak at the face of the shower, so we had to take it down. But we still ordered another to replace it. Hopefully this one won't have the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Vars

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed in the product. After about two weeks one of the shower head lights stopped lighting consistently. Only lights up when it's in a certain position. Also a little difficult to change the spout on the shower head. Have to be very gentle or you can break the whole thing because it's made of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia griffa

customer_reviews.title: Works great...but maybe too great
customer_reviews.text: The cost was the same as a standard shower spray, but the idea for my daughter to have lights and the detachment wand was worth every penny. The hydro power lights work while the shower is on, change on their own and is very fun, however now the showers take longer!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Work okay
customer_reviews.text: Smaller holes in the head would of helped with the pressure being so low. Our other shower head had no problems hitting the back wall of the shower with force. This one goes out maybe 2' and no pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Stafford

customer_reviews.title: If you want this type of product, don't have a high expectation. You may still like it.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it lights up. Just not quite as bright as I thought it would be. Also a bit bummed that it doesn't stay lit for a bit after the water shuts off. But I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kollerbohm

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️it
customer_reviews.text: One of the best investments I have purse just in a long time in waiting for a shower head like this Very easy to install very easy to use get in soap up spray off and go
customer_reviews.author: La Donna

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: For this product I was blown away it was really inexpensive very easy to install took me less than 5 minutes to install it and the lights on it are so bright you can literally take a shower with the lights off I love it may purchase another one for my other bathrooms
customer_reviews.author: Tiera Colonel

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation and easy to put together. No batteries is awesome and the pressure is great (drops a bit when you use both heads at once). Colors change randomly and you can't turn them off so if you're not into that look elsewhere. All in all I think it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: STDJ

customer_reviews.title: Installing this was easy, we have been using it for a while ...
customer_reviews.text: Installing this was easy, we have been using it for a while now and we love it! I mean unless your bathroom is SUPER dark the lights arent really noticable. They aren't very bright, but it is relaxing if you take showers with the lights off. The heads both work well, easy to switch between each. For what we paid I cant say I could have got a better one at home depot or something and this one lights up. Very enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: J&D

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would. Broke immediately after I took it out the box. Even after I tried to fix it....it leaked everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Short Stufff

customer_reviews.title: Shower head makes noise
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews that the shower head was making a lot of noise. I didnt believe it and I just installed mine. The shower head is making noise every time it tries to switch led color. loud crackling noise.
customer_reviews.author: monicaselina

customer_reviews.title: Not as bright as it shows
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice shower head but it does not show as brightly as it does in the picture. And it does not show the colors as colorful or as many as you think. However the water and the pulse massager Etc is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: GypsyChylde

customer_reviews.title: The lights don't always work
customer_reviews.text: The lights sometimes stop working, and won't come on. It defeats the purpose of paying for the product. When it works it is okay, but not great. It failed to meet my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Makes Showering fun
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a shower for a special needs child on the spectrum and he was fascinated with the color change based on water temperature.
customer_reviews.author: David Steelman

customer_reviews.title: Not chrome
customer_reviews.text: Main housing is plastic that looks like chrome. Good luck getting a good seal with plastic parts. Also, the generator that creates the power for the LED's is water driven, but has a loud noise. Too much, that I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Great luminous colors
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting to post a review. I had this shower head for a few weeks now and so far so good. No leaking. Water pressure is great even when using both heads. The colors are pretty and very luminous. Only thing is you sometimes have to play with it to change the head setting. I am very satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: BarBara Futrell

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase and value for its money. You can make one head work at a time or both. You can change the fall of the water in each head too. The lights are cool too!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M Ortiz

product_meta.title: Luminex by PowerSpa 7-Color 24-Setting LED Shower Head Combo with Air Jet LED Turbo Pressure-Boost Nozzle Technology. 7 Vibrant LED colors change automatically every few seconds
product_meta.description:
Luminex by PowerSpa 7-Color 24-Setting LED Shower Head Combo with Air Jet LED Turbo Pressure-Boost Nozzle Technology. 7 vibrant LED colors change automatically every few seconds. Use two Color Changing LED Showers Heads separately or use LED Showerhead and LED Handheld Shower both together for a choice of 24 different water patterns.

• Use each shower separately or both together!
• Choose from 24 full and combined water flow patterns
• LED lights are powered by running water, no batteries ever needed
• 7 vibrant LED colors change automatically every few seconds, gradually blending into one another
• Both Shower Heads feature Hydro Supercharged Turbine LED, Air Jet design that maximizes your water pressure output performance by injecting oxygen into water flow through 48 elastic rub-clean nozzles that help prevent clogging.
• Each showerhead has oversize 4" face and 4 settings that include Rain, Massage, Rain with Massage and water-saving Pause mode
• Both showers are angle-adjustable
• Handheld shower can be removed from overhead bracket for up-close handheld use and mobility
• Patented 3-way Water Diverter with Anti-swivel Lock Nut
• Extra-flexible 5 ft stainless steel hose with dual solid brass conical nuts for easy hand-tightening
• Connects in Minutes without Tools to any standard overhead shower arm
• Limited 1 Year Warranty
feature_bullets: 24 Setting Color Changing LED Showerhead and LED Handheld Shower Combo | LED lights are powered by running water, no batteries ever needed | 7 vibrant LED colors change automatically every few seconds, gradually blending into one another

Both Shower Heads feature Hydro Supercharged Turbine LED, Air Jet design that maximizes your water pressure output performance by injecting oxygen into water flow through 48 elastic rub-clean nozzles that help prevent clogging.
Each showerhead has oversize 4" face and 4 settings that include Rain, Massage, Rain with Massage and water-saving Pause mode | Both showers are angle-adjustable

Handheld shower can be removed from overhead bracket for up-close handheld use and mobility | Patented 3-way Water Diverter with Anti-swivel Lock Nut | Extra-flexible 5 foot Stainless Steel Shower Hose with dual solid brass conical nuts for easy hand-tightening
EASY TO REGISTER WARRANTY: Hassle-Free US Limited 1 Year Warranty with LIVE customer service representatives in US.

specifications.Style: LED 24-Settings Shower Heads Combo With Hose
specifications.Material: Chrome Plated Premium ABS, Stainless Steel Hose
specifications.Special Features: Easy to Install, Tools Free Intallation, Fits Any Standard Shower Arm, Limited Lifetime Warranty, Adjustable, LED
specifications.Included Components: LED Shower Head, LED Handshower, 3 Way Diverter, Hose, Instructions Manual, Warranty
